author: MovieGasm‍․com
description:
🧟‍♂️ MARVEL ZOMBIES – Official Trailer (2025) | New Animated Horror Series in 4K
The Avengers are dead… but the undead have risen. Marvel Zombies is the chilling new animated sci-fi horror mini-series that turns your heroes into your worst nightmares — streaming in 4K Ultra HD this September.

🔎 Series Overview
In an alternate timeline unleashed from What If...?, a deadly virus has turned iconic heroes into flesh-hungry zombies. A band of survivors — including Ms. Marvel, Shang-Chi, and Kate Bishop — must fight superpowered undead to save what remains of the world.

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
